subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a mouth full of teeth. {{zh-l|之}} or {{zh-l|止}} was later added on top as a phonetic component.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|anatomy}} [[tooth]]
#: {{zh-x|牙齒|tooth}}
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} [[tooth]]- or [[zigzag]]-like thing, such as [[sawtooth]], [[cogwheel]], [[fern]], etc.
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} [[age]] (of a person or animal)
# to [[juxtapose]]; to put [[side by side]]
# to [[utter]]; to [[mention]]
# to [[employ]]; to [[take in]]
# to [[touch]]; to be in [[contact]] with
